quickstack.carrotconfig.title: QuickStack Configuration!
quickstack.carrotconfig.title.name: General
quickstack.carrotconfig.allowHotbarQuick: Denotes whether items in the hotbar should be quick stacked.
quickstack.carrotconfig.containerSearchR: Denotes the distance (in blocks) to search for containers when quick stacking.
quickstack.carrotconfig.containerHighlig: Denotes the duration (in seconds) for which deposited containers are highlighted after being quick stacked.
